name: Naraa, the living book 2017
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Discover the landscapes of Mongolia: Naraa combines a real children's book with a unique app using augmented reality. Naraa wants to become a shaman and she needs you! You must help her win the trust of the spirits by freeing their realms invaded by the villainous Iblis. Only then can you wake up the Great Bear. 

Platform: Tablet + Book / Engine: Unity 3D / Vuforia
Number of players: 1

Producer : Inès BENYOUCEF  
Game Design : Nicolas DUVAL, David BIRGE-COTTE
Game Art : Perrine  LOZINGUEZ, Charlotte COUDERC, Julie MIZREH, Violaine BERTHOUMIEU        
Game Programming : Rémi CARREIRA, Benjamin HADDAD, Matthieu JAGU
Music & Sound Design : Victor de LIPSKI
